title: Leaver buster is not fair as is
body:
It's late, I'm tired, this may not get much traction but, PLEASE. Change leaver buster.
Here is why:
I try to load into a norms game, duoing with a friend botlane, recently leagues servers and my IPS haven't been communicating well so I ask him to tell me if the game loads before I load in. This bug has been here every once in a while (1/10 games?) but no biggie, because I can reload as a work around. So I DO, and am relieved I reconnected before 5 mins, like 4:08 ish. I play the game, win bot win game... Then at the end I get NOTHING because I have a leaver buster!
https://i.imgur.com/Lqu7XO0.jpg

So I am left thinking, WHY? I CAME BACK, PLAYED MY HARDEST, WON and lets be honest, got back pretty fast considering the bug.
It DOESN'T have to be this way! Especially not in a norms!
Proof that I did what I said I did and even evidence of the bug where I Disconnect and reconnect for a second early on:
https://youtu.be/WA23DMLTEsc

Now, I KNOW that leaver buster will ONLY ban you if you displayed afk behaviors recently, and I admit it, I HAVE. But do you know WHY?
BECAUSE OF THE BUG AGAIN :|

I could describe the bug in  more detail and even send a ticket, but i'm tired, and this probably wont get as much traction as it needs for the devs to see it anyways.

TL;DR Loading in late, especially to a bug shouldn't be grounds for a leaver buster, especially if people can't even remake...
